statements: SELECT * FROM EmployeeEngagementSurveyData WHERE survey_score > 80;
SELECT employee_id, survey_date FROM EmployeeEngagementSurveyData ORDER BY survey_date DESC;
SELECT AVG(survey_score) AS average_score FROM EmployeeEngagementSurveyData;
SELECT employee_id, COUNT(*) AS total_surveys FROM EmployeeEngagementSurveyData GROUP BY employee_id ORDER BY total_surveys DESC;
SELECT * FROM EmployeeEngagementSurveyData WHERE survey_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM EmployeeEngagementSurveyData WHERE survey_score > 80 ORDER BY survey_date DESC;
SELECT employee_id, survey_date, survey_score FROM EmployeeEngagementSurveyData WHERE feedback LIKE '%positive%' ORDER BY survey_score DESC;
SELECT AVG(survey_score) AS average_score, COUNT(*) AS total_surveys FROM EmployeeEngagementSurveyData WHERE survey_date BETWEEN '2022-06-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT employee_id, MAX(survey_score) AS highest_score, MIN(survey_score) AS lowest_score FROM EmployeeEngagementSurveyData GROUP BY employee_id;
SELECT DISTINCT survey_date, COUNT(DISTINCT employee_id) AS unique_employees FROM EmployeeEngagementSurveyData GROUP BY survey_date HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT employee_id) > 3;
SELECT * FROM EmployeeEngagementSurvey WHERE employee_id = 101;
SELECT id, survey_date, engagement_score FROM EmployeeEngagementSurvey ORDER BY survey_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM EmployeeEngagementSurvey WHERE engagement_score > 80;
SELECT id, employee_id, engagement_score FROM EmployeeEngagementSurvey WHERE survey_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT employee_id, AVG(engagement_score) AS average_score FROM EmployeeEngagementSurvey GROUP BY employee_id;
SELECT id, employee_id, survey_date, engagement_score FROM EmployeeEngagementSurvey WHERE engagement_score > 80 ORDER BY survey_date DESC
SELECT * FROM EmployeeEngagementSurvey WHERE employee_id = 1001 AND engagement_score BETWEEN 70 AND 90
SELECT id, policy_name FROM TelecommutingPolicies WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY id ASC
SELECT survey_date, AVG(engagement_score) AS avg_score FROM EmployeeEngagementSurvey GROUP BY survey_date HAVING COUNT(*) > 1
SELECT * FROM TelecommutingPolicies WHERE policy_description LIKE '%remote work%'
SELECT * FROM employee_engagement_survey;
SELECT employee_id, satisfaction_rating, engagement_score FROM employee_engagement_survey;
SELECT survey_id, employee_id, satisfaction_rating, engagement_score FROM employee_engagement_survey WHERE satisfaction_rating > 3;
SELECT * FROM employee_demographics ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT employee_id, first_name, last_name, age, department FROM employee_demographics WHERE gender = 'M';
SELECT * FROM employee_demographics WHERE gender = 'M' ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, department FROM employee_demographics WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT survey_id, employee_id, satisfaction_rating FROM employee_engagement_survey WHERE engagement_score >= 80 ORDER BY satisfaction_rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM telecommuting_policies WHERE policy_category = 'IT' ORDER BY policy_name ASC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, department, age FROM employee_demographics WHERE department LIKE 'S%' ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT * FROM survey_data;
SELECT employee_id, satisfaction_score FROM survey_data;
SELECT department_name, location FROM department_data;
SELECT employee_name, job_title FROM employee_details;
SELECT survey_id, satisfaction_score, engagement_score FROM survey_data;
SELECT * FROM survey_data WHERE satisfaction_score > 8;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employee_details WHERE job_title = 'Manager';
SELECT employee_name, job_title FROM employee_details WHERE department = 'HR';
SELECT feedback_text FROM manager_feedback WHERE survey_id = 123;
SELECT employee_name, job_title FROM employee_details WHERE department = 'Engineering' ORDER BY employee_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM SurveyResponses LIMIT 10;
SELECT employee_id, name, department FROM Employees WHERE manager_id = 1;
SELECT policy_name, policy_description FROM Policies ORDER BY policy_id DESC;
SELECT survey_date, question_1 FROM SurveyResponses WHERE question_2 = 'Good';
SELECT name, hire_date FROM Employees WHERE department = 'HR' ORDER BY hire_date;
SELECT name, department FROM Employees;
SELECT DISTINCT department FROM Employees;
SELECT name, hire_date FROM Employees WHERE department = 'HR';
SELECT * FROM SurveyResponses WHERE survey_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT question_1, question_2, question_3 FROM SurveyResponses WHERE employee_id = 1001;
